taskDefinition.name: BMC ITSM7 Task Create Detailed
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Creates a TMS:Task entry that belongs to either a Change or Incident record.

parameter.label: Task Name
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Name' field of the TMS:Task record

parameter.label: Summary
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Summary' field of the TMS:Task record

parameter.label: Notes
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Notes' field of the TMS:Task record

parameter.label: Status
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Status' field of the TMS:Task record

parameter.label: Priority
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Priority' field of the TMS:Task record

parameter.label: Sequence Number
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Sequence Number' field of the TMS:Task record

parameter.label: Task Location Company
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Location Company' field of the TMS:Task entry

parameter.label: Requested For Company
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Company' field under the Requested For's details of the TMS:Task entry

parameter.label: First Name
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'First Name' field under the Requested For's details of the TMS:Task entry

parameter.label: Last Name
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Last Name' field under the Requested For's details of the TMS:Task entry

parameter.label: Middle Name
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Middle Name' field under the Requested For's details of the TMS:Task entry

parameter.label: Organization
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Organization' field under the Requested For's details of the TMS:Task entry

parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Department' field under the Requested For's details of the TMS:Task entry

parameter.tooltip: Sets the hidden 'Assignee Group ID' field of the TMS:Task entry. This is required to validate the assigned group.

parameter.label: Assignee Full Name (as in Remedy)
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Assignee' field of the TMS:Task entry

parameter.label: Assignee ID
parameter.tooltip: Sets the hidden 'Assignee ID' field of the TMS:Task entry

parameter.label: Notify Assignee
parameter.tooltip: Sets the 'Notify Assigee' field of the TMS:Task entry, the default is 'Yes

parameter.label: Parent Form Name
parameter.tooltip: The form of the parent record, either CHG:Infrastructure Change or HPD:Help Desk

parameter.label: Parent Change or Incident Id
parameter.tooltip: The display id of the parent record, which is either a Change or an Incident record

parameter.label: ParentInstance Id
parameter.tooltip: The instance id of the parent record, which is either a Change or an Incident record
